com.jakewharton.android.actionbarsherlock
Class ActionBarSherlock

java.lang.Object
  com.jakewharton.android.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock

public final class ActionBarSherlock
extends Object

Helper for implementing the action bar design pattern across all versions of Android.

This class will automatically use the native android.app.ActionBar implementation on Android 3.0 or later. For previous versions which do not include a native action bar, an optional custom handler can be provided to initialize a third-party action bar implementation of your choice.

Further interaction with these action bars can be handled through extending the default handlers as inner-classes of your activity. The classes will allow for overriding various methods to handle the creation of and interaction with each type of action bar.

Examples of third-party implementations can be found in the samples folder of the repository, or by visiting the GitHub project page.

Author:
Jake Wharton

Nested Class Summary
static class ActionBarSherlock.ActionBarHandler<T>
          Base class for handling an action bar that has been created by a ActionBarSherlock attachment.
static class ActionBarSherlock.Activity
          Special android.app.Activity wrapper which will allow for unifying common functionality via the ActionBarSherlock API.
static interface ActionBarSherlock.DropDownHandler
          Interface which denotes a handler supports using a drop-down list for navigation.
static class ActionBarSherlock.FragmentActivity
          Special android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity wrapper which will allow for unifying common functionality via the ActionBarSherlock API.
static interface ActionBarSherlock.HomeAsUpHandler
          Interface which denotes a handler supports setting the home action item as an "up" affordance.
static class ActionBarSherlock.ListActivity
          Deprecated. The use of Fragments and ListFragment is suggested for working with lists. It provides a much nicer experience when scaled up to the large tablet-sized screens.
static interface ActionBarSherlock.LogoHandler
          Interface which denotes a third-party action bar handler implementation supports using the activity logo rather than just the home icon and a title.
static interface ActionBarSherlock.MenuHandler
          Interface which denotes a third-party action bar handler implementation supports populating the action bar from an XML menu.
static class ActionBarSherlock.NativeActionBarHandler
          Minimal handler for Android's native android.app.ActionBar.
static interface ActionBarSherlock.OnNavigationListener
          Listener interface for ActionBar navigation events.

Field Detail

HAS_NATIVE_ACTION_BAR

public static final boolean HAS_NATIVE_ACTION_BAR

Whether or not the current classloader has access to Android's native android.app.ActionBar class.

This can be used anywhere in your application to determine whether the native android.app.ActionBar or a custom action bar will be displayed and act accordingly.

menu

public ActionBarSherlock menu(int menuResourceId)
Resource ID of a menu to inflate as buttons onto the action bar. This requires that the implementing activity class be extended from ActionBarSherlock.Activity, ActionBarSherlock.ListActivity, or ActionBarSherlock.FragmentActivity.

menuResourceId - Resource ID for menu XML.

Current instance for builder pattern.
